name: template-project
description: A template for frontend projects with HTML, optional React/Vite, and utility scripts.

scripts.start: echo "No explicit start command for the root template. Serve TEMPLATE/index.html or specific content manually."
scripts.dev: echo "Run 'npm run dev' from within a specific Vite project if applicable, or serve TEMPLATE/index.html."
scripts.test: echo "Open TEMPLATE/test.html in a browser to run manual tests."
